original_text: These were all Ishmael's sons. Their names became the names of 12 groups of people. They separated and lived in their own lands. Ishmael's sons ruled over the 12 groups of people.
korean_text: 이들은 이스마엘의 아들들이요 그 촌과 부락대로 된 이름이며 그 족속대로는 열두 지도자들이었더라

sentences.original_text: Their names became the names of 12 groups of people.
They separated and lived in their own lands.
Ishmael's sons ruled over the 12 groups of people.
